title: [Rant] Deodarants: chill tf out when you're using it
content:
listen man, i get it, its ISA week, time is tight and schedules are tighter, and not everyone has the time to shower first thing in the morning _everyday_, _consistantly_

admittedly, I use deodorant in a few non-isa mornings too

BUT CHILL TF OUT WHEN UR APPLYING IT

like dude, i get that your body odour is bad, but you really dont need to be dumping HALF a bottle of deodarant on yourself, A FEW SPRAYS DOES THE SAME TRICK

objectively speaking, I'd rather be subjected to MILD body odour than be subjected to whatever tf i experienced today in that assessment center

I'm not asking you to quit using deodarant entirely, all I'm saying is, if the ENTIRE exam center can SMELL that you used old spice today, then you've used WAY TOO MUCH

I dont wanna he leaving the exam hall with my mucus and saliva TASTING LIKE COLOGNE

you realise that you're wasting cologne right? like..... u dont smell great when u overuse cologne, you just smell like ethanol gas

I WANNA CALL OUT NAMES BUT ITS NOT LIKE IT WAS JUST ONE OR TWO PEOPLE DOIN THIS SHIT

THERE WAS LIKE *COMFORTABLY* 5 PEOPLE IN MY OWN ASSESSMENT ROOM THAT WERE GOONING A KILOGRAM OF DEODARANT

that exam center...... it felt like being in a gas chamber

and just when i think that my week couldnt get any worse, i look at the calendar AND ITS _STILL FUCKING *MONDAY*_


this is gonna be a long week..... and I'm tired already

all the best with ISAs guys

comments.body: Just how bad was it, that u posted it on reddit
One might even say it was, breathtakingly bad
shut up and take my upvote
